name: htmx-ext-hold
description: An htmx extension to trigger events on 'hold' (mousedown/touchstart for a duration)

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --target browser --format esm --outfile dist/index.mjs && bun build src/index.ts --target browser --format cjs --outfile dist/index.js

author: Prayag Bhakar [@81reap]
